attributes.action: Stop the New Lower Thames Crossing!
attributes.additional_details: Thurrock Council are holding meetings for those affected and those who are involved with the plans. Let's not let the government rip through our land, our livelihoods, our communities, and most of all, our homes! People of Thurrock and the surrounding, unite against these savage plans!
attributes.background: The new crossing will rip through significant areas of Thurrock, including residential areas in the borough. Other options of the same outcome include Dartford and other neighbouring areas across the Thames. The Government are willing to strip people from their homes, and tear up entire communities!
